last_moving_entity.template:
{sentence}

What is the last entity in motion mentioned in the sentence if any? Otherwise, respond with "No entity in motion".

any_entity.template:
{sentence}

Are there any entities in motion in the sentence?

find_entities_question.template:
{sentence}

What are the entities in motion in the previous sentence? Return {"'No entity'"} if you can't find any. If there are multiple entities, use a comma to join them.

more_than_one.template:
Extract: {sentence}

Is there more than one mention of a moving entity in the extract?

count_entities.template:
{sentence}
How many moving entities are mentioned in the sentence above?

find_entities_list_out.template:
List out the entities in motion in the following sentence (if there are multiple entities, use a comma to join them). Respond {"'No entity'"} if you can't find any. 

{sentence}

find_entities_moving_in_video.template:
Sam has watched a video described as "{sentence}". What are the entities moving in the video? 

List the entities separated by commas. Return {"'No entity'"} if there isn't any.

first_moving_entity.template:
{sentence}

Name the first entity in motion mentioned in the sentence if any. Otherwise, respond with "No entity in motion".

count_entities_affirm.template:
Count the number of moving entities in the following sentence.
{sentence}

any_entity_reference.template:
Is there any reference to movement in the following sentence?

{sentence}

find_entities_extract.template:
Extract: {sentence}

Can you find all mentions of moving entities in the extract? Return {"'No entity'"} if you can't find any.  If there are multiple entities, use a comma to join them.

find_entities_dynamic.template:
What are the dynamic entities in the following sentence (if there are multiple entities, use a comma to join them)? Dynamic entities refer to objects in motion. Respond {"'No entity'"} if you can't find any. 

{sentence}
